histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.Bluetooth.Adapter.SetName.Result
histogram.summary: Records whether the request to set the adapter's name has succeeded. Emitted when the request succeeds or fails.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.Bluetooth.Adapter.SetScanMode.Result
histogram.summary: Records whether the request to set the adapter's scan mode has succeeded. Emitted when the request succeeds or fails.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.Bluetooth.ClassicMedium.ConnectToService.Duration
histogram.summary: Records time spent in milliseconds to establish a Bluetooth service connection successfully.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.Bluetooth.ClassicMedium.{Operation}.Result
histogram.summary: Records the result of {Operation}.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.Bluetooth.LEMedium.StartAdvertising.Result
histogram.summary: Records whether the request to start advertising has succeeded.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.Bluetooth.LEMedium.StartScanning.Result
histogram.summary: Records whether BLE scanning has been initiated successfully.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.Bluetooth.LEMedium.StopAdvertising.Result
histogram.summary: Records whether the request to stop advertising has succeeded.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.Bluetooth.LEMedium.StopScanning.Result
histogram.summary: Records whether BLE scanning has been stopped successfully.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.InstantMessaging.ReceiveExpress.NumParsingAttempts
histogram.summary: Records the number of parsing attempts it takes the stream parser to check byte by byte if the data it received forms a valid StreamBody proto. Emitted every time we get a receive-express HTTP response from the Instant Messaging API.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.InstantMessaging.TachyonIceConfigFetcher.CacheHit
histogram.summary: Records whether the cache was used to satisfy the GetIceServers request. Emitted when GetIceServers is called.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.InstantMessaging.TachyonIceConfigFetcher.FailureReason
histogram.summary: Records the HTTP response code or net error code of the GetIceServers API call to the Tachyon server. Emitted only on failure or timeout.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.InstantMessaging.TachyonIceConfigFetcher.OAuthTokenFetchResult
histogram.summary: Records whether the Tachyon OAuth token was successfully fetched. Emitted when the token fetcher request returns.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.InstantMessaging.TachyonIceConfigFetcher.Result
histogram.summary: Records the result of the GetIceServers API call to the Tachyon server. Emitted when the http response is received or when the call times out.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.InstantMessaging.{Direction}Express.OAuthTokenFetchResult
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the user was able to fetch the OAuth token necessary to {Direction} the Instant Messaging API. Emitted at the conclusion of the token request, which is attempted right before making HTTPS requests to the Instant Messaging API.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.InstantMessaging.{Direction}Express.Result
histogram.summary: Records whether an HTTPS call to {Direction} the Instant Messaging API succeeds or fails. Emitted when the HTTPS call succeeds or fails.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.InstantMessaging.{Direction}Express.Result.FailureReason
histogram.summary: Records the network error code or HTTPS response code from a failed HTTPS call to {Direction} the Instant Messaging API. Emitted when the HTTPS call fails.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.UtilityProcessShutdownReason
histogram.summary: Records why the Sharing utility process, which hosts Nearby Connections, was shut down: for an expected reason (i.e., shut down request from a client), or another unexpected reason (e.g., a crash).

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.UtilityProcessShutdownReason.DisconnectedMojoDependency
histogram.summary: Records which Mojo dependency of the Sharing utility process disconnected from the browser process. This will not necessarily line up with the counts in the Mojo disconnect bucket of Nearby.Connections.UtilityProcessShutdownReason which tracks disconnects on the utility process side.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.WifiLan.ConnectResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of trying to connect to another device's TCP server socket. Emitted after a cross-device connection attempts to be established over TCP sockets. Note: One device listens for incoming connections while the other device tries to connect. This metric is logged by the connecting device.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.WifiLan.ListenResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of listening for and accepting incoming TCP socket connections. Emitted after a cross-device connection attempts to be established over TCP sockets. Note: One device listens for incoming connections while the other device tries to connect. This metric is logged by the listening device.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.WifiLan.Socket.AcceptResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of a TCP server socket accepting incoming connections. This is a lower-level metric that tracks the result code from the TCP server socket accept call made in the networking layer. Emitted after a cross-device connection attempts to be established over TCP sockets. Note: Only one device opens a server socket, which the other device attempts to connect to.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.WifiLan.TimeToConnect
histogram.summary: Records the time it takes to successfully connect to another device's TCP server socket. Emitted after a cross-device connection is established over TCP sockets. Not emitted on failure.

histogram.name: Nearby.Connections.{Medium}.Socket.{Operation}.Result
histogram.summary: Records success or failure when {Operation} of a {Medium} socket. Emitted during cross-device data transfers.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.BackgroundScanning.DeviceNearbySharing.Notification.Flow
histogram.summary: Records each step in the background scanning notification flow if Nearby Share onboarding is complete. Emitted after the notification that a nearby device is trying to share is shown, and again when the user acts on the notification by clicking enable, dismiss or exit. Clicking enable puts the user in high-visibility mode.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.BackgroundScanning.DeviceNearbySharing.Notification.TimeToAction
histogram.summary: Records how long it takes for a user to act on a background scanning notification if Nearby Share onboarding is complete. Emitted after the user acts on the notification by clicking enable, dismiss or exit.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.BackgroundScanning.DevicesDetected
histogram.summary: Logs an event when there were previously no devices nearby trying to share and now there are nearby devices trying to share. Emitted when the nearby devices trying to share changes from zero to greater than zero. A notification will not be shown on this event if the user dismissed the notification in the last 15 minutes.This metric is not emitted if the background scanning feature is disabled.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.BackgroundScanning.DevicesDetected.Duration
histogram.summary: Records for how long nearby devices were trying to share. Emitted after the number of devices trying to share goes from greater than zero to zero. This metric is not emitted if the background scanning feature is disabled.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.BackgroundScanning.SessionStarted
histogram.summary: Records whether an attempt to start a background scanning session succeeded or failed. Emitted after the bluetooth adapter notifies whether starting the background scanning session was successfully started. This metric is not emitted if the background scanning feature is disabled.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.BackgroundScanning.Setup.Notification.Flow
histogram.summary: Records each step in the background scanning notification flow if Nearby Share onboarding is not complete. Emitted after the notification that a nearby device is trying to share is shown, and again when the user acts on the notification by clicking setup, dismiss or exit. Clicking setup initiates Nearby Share onboarding.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.BackgroundScanning.Setup.Notification.TimeToAction
histogram.summary: Records how long it takes for a user to act on a background scanning notification if Nearby Share onboarding is not complete. Emitted after the user acts on the notification by clicking setup, dismiss or exit.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Manager.BluetoothMacAddressPresentForPrivateCertificateCreation
histogram.summary: Records whether or not a Bluetooth MAC address was able to be fetched during the local device's private certificate creation. Emitted after private certificates attempt to be created, which typically occurs every three days if Nearby Share is enabled. This will only be emitted once if multiple certificates are created at a time, for example, when all certificates are created after onboarding.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Manager.DownloadPublicCertificatesCount
histogram.summary: If the Nearby Share certificate manager successfully downloads public certificates, then record the total number of certificates downloaded across all pages.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Manager.DownloadPublicCertificatesFailuePageCount
histogram.summary: If the Nearby Share certificate manager fails to download public certificates, then record the page number of the page on which the failure occurred.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Manager.DownloadPublicCertificatesHttpResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async ListPublicCertificates API call to the Nearby Sharing server when the certificate manager periodically downloads public certificates. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Manager.DownloadPublicCertificatesSuccessPageCount
histogram.summary: If the Nearby Share certificate manager successfully downloads public certificates, then record the number of pages downloaded by the RPC.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Manager.DownloadPublicCertificatesSuccessRate
histogram.summary: Records whether the Nearby Share certificate manager successfully downloaded public certificates from the server and stored them in leveldb.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Manager.GetDecryptedPublicCertificateResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async GetDecryptedPublicCertificate call in certificate manager.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Storage.InitializeAttemptCount
histogram.summary: If the Nearby Share certificate storage successfully initializes the public certificate database, then record the number of attempts it took.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Storage.InitializeAttemptResult
histogram.summary: For individual initialization attempts of the Nearby Share certificate storage public certificate database, record the init status returned by leveldb_proto.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Storage.InitializeSuccessDuration
histogram.summary: Records the time necessary to successfully initialize the Nearby Share public certificates database. Emitted once after sign-in when the Nearby Share service starts.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Certificates.Storage.{Operation}SuccessRate
histogram.summary: Record success rate of Nearby Share storage operation {Operation}.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Connection.EstablishOutgoingConnection.Success
histogram.summary: Records whether an attempt to establish a connection to a receiving device succeeded or failed; cancellations are ignored. Emitted after the user selects a device to send a payload to but before the payload begins its transfer. Because the sending device initiates the connection--via the Nearby Connections library--this metric is only emitted for outgoing transfers.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Connection.EstablishOutgoingConnectionStatus
histogram.summary: Records whether an attempt to establish a connection to a receiving device succeeded, failed, or was cancelled. Emitted after the user selects a device to send a payload to but before the payload begins its transfer. Because the sending device initiates the connection--via the Nearby Connections library--this metric is only emitted for outgoing transfers.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Connection.TimeToEstablishOutgoingConnection
histogram.summary: Records the time necessary to successfully establish a connection to a receiving device. Emitted after the user selects a device to send a payload to but before the payload begins its transfer, and this is only emitted after a successful connection is established. Because the sending device initiates the connection--via the Nearby Connections library--this metric is only emitted for outgoing transfers.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Contacts.CanGetProfileUserName
histogram.summary: Records whether or not we able to retrieve the profile user name--think email address--from the Chromebook's profile data. This value is sent to the Nearby Share server to allow sharing with other devices logged in with the same account. Emitted every time contacts are downloaded for use in Nearby Share. Because contacts are not stored locally, contacts are periodically downloaded for users with Nearby Share enabled and additionally whenever a user enters Nearby Share settings or participates in a sharing flow.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Contacts.DownloadPageCount.{Result}
histogram.summary: Contacts are downloaded in pages, i.e., multiple ListContactPeople RPC request/responses. Records the {Result}. Emitted every time contacts are downloaded for use in Nearby Share. Because contacts are not stored locally, contacts are periodically downloaded for users with Nearby Share enabled and additionally whenever a user enters Nearby Share settings or participates in a sharing flow.

variant.name: Failure
variant.summary: page number of the first HTTP failure

variant.name: Success
variant.summary: number of pages needed to download the user's full contact list

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Contacts.DownloadResult
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the full, possibly paginated contact download from the Nearby server was successful. Emitted every time contacts are downloaded for use in Nearby Share. Because contacts are not stored locally, contacts are periodically downloaded for users with Nearby Share enabled and additionally whenever a user enters Nearby Share settings or participates in a sharing flow.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Contacts.HttpResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of each ListContactPeople RPC call to the Nearby Share server. Emitted every time contacts are downloaded for use in Nearby Share. Due to pagination, this is emitted for every page of contacts downloaded. Because contacts are not stored locally, contacts are periodically downloaded for users with Nearby Share enabled and additionally whenever a user enters Nearby Share settings or participates in a sharing flow.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Contacts.NumContacts.{Type}
histogram.summary: Records the number of {Type} contacts downloaded from the Nearby server. Emitted every time contacts are downloaded for use in Nearby Share. Because contacts are not stored locally, contacts are periodically downloaded for users with Nearby Share enabled and additionally whenever a user enters Nearby Share settings or participates in a sharing flow.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Contacts.Percent{Type}
histogram.summary: Records the percentage of {Type} Emitted every time contacts are downloaded for use in Nearby Share. Because contacts are not stored locally, contacts are periodically downloaded for users with Nearby Share enabled and additionally whenever a user enters Nearby Share settings or participates in a sharing flow.

variant.name: DeviceContactType
variant.summary: unfiltered contacts that are device-type contacts.

variant.name: Selected
variant.summary: (filtered) contacts that are selected by the user in the setting/onboarding UI. Only emitted for users in selected-contacts visibility mode.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Contacts.TimeToDownload.{Result}
histogram.summary: Records the time spent {Result}. Emitted every time contacts are downloaded for use in Nearby Share. Because contacts are not stored locally, contacts are periodically downloaded for users with Nearby Share enabled and additionally whenever a user enters Nearby Share settings or participates in a sharing flow.

variant.name: Success
variant.summary: to successfully download the user's full contact list

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.DeviceType{Direction}
histogram.summary: Records the device type that the user {Direction}. Emitted when a transfer completes successfully, fails, or was aborted by the user, for example, by cancelling the transfer.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Discovery.Delay.FromStartDiscoveryTo{EndState}
histogram.summary: Records the delay between the start of the discovery session and {EndState}.

variant.name: AnyDiscovery
variant.summary: the discovery of any share target

variant.name: FirstDiscovery
variant.summary: the discovery of the first share target

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Discovery.FurthestDiscoveryProgress
histogram.summary: Records the furthest state reached in a single Nearby Share discovery session. Emitted when the per-session discovery manager is destroyed.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Discovery.LookUpSelectedShareTarget
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the selected share target on the Nearby Share discovery page can be found in the per-session discovery manager's map of discovered share targets. Emitted when the user selects a share target from the discovery page and tries to proceed to the next step in the UI.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Discovery.NumShareTargets.{Variation}
histogram.summary: Records the number of share targets {Variation} in a single discovery session. Emitted once during the discovery session.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Discovery.{Operation}
histogram.summary: Records the result of {Operation}. Emitted immediately after the operation is attempted for each discovery session.

variant.name: StartSend
variant.summary: beginning a transfer of an attachment to the selected share target on the discovery page

variant.name: UnregisterSendSurface
variant.summary: unregistering the per-session discovery manager with the Nearby Share service

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Enabled
histogram.summary: Records if the user has the Nearby Share feature enabled, and if not, records why the feature is not enabled. For example, the feature is not allowed by policy, or the user onboarded but later disabled the feature. Emitted on sign-in and whenever the feature state changes, for instance, from disabled to enabled.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.EnabledStateChanged
histogram.summary: Records the enabled/disabled state of Nearby Share. Emitted when the feature state changes from disabled to enabled or vice versa. This can happen after Nearby Share onboarding or when the user enables/disables the Nearby Share feature toggle in Settings.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.IsKnownContact
histogram.summary: Records whether or not the device shared with is a known contact, i.e., contact-based sharing. Emitted when a transfer completes successfully, fails, or was aborted by the user, for example, by cancelling the transfer.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.LocalDeviceData.DeviceDataUpdater.HttpResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of the async UpdateDevice API call to the Nearby Sharing server when the device data updater makes a request. Recorded when the async callback is invoked or when the call times out.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Medium.ChangedToMedium
histogram.summary: Records the data-transfer medium that the Nearby Connections library successfully switches to during a Nearby Share transfer. Emitted when the Nearby Connections library notifies the client of a bandwidth upgrade.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Medium.InitiateBandwidthUpgradeResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of Nearby Share starting a bandwidth upgrade via the Nearby Connections library. This metric only records the result of initiating the change not the result of fully finishing an upgrade. Also, this metric does not capture automatic bandwidth upgrades initiated internally by the Nearby Connections library. Emitted when the Nearby Connections client explicitly requests a bandwidth upgrade.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Medium.RequestedBandwidthUpgradeResult
histogram.summary: Records if the transfer medium was successfully upgraded after an explicit bandwidth upgrade request from the client. Emitted when the transfer channel is disconnected after a bandwidth upgrade request was made by the client.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Onboarding.Duration
histogram.summary: Records the time that it took the user to successfully complete the onboarding flow. Only emitted on successful completion of onboarding.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Onboarding.EntryPoint
histogram.summary: Records how the user entered the onboarding flow. The options are from OS Settings, the tray icon and the share sheet. Emitted as soon as the user embarks on the one-time Nearby Share onboarding flow, regardless of whether or not they successfully finish.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Onboarding.FlowEvent
histogram.summary: Records how users interacte with the onboarding flow. Emitted when users embark the Nearby Share onboarding flow, click buttons during the process.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Onboarding.Result
histogram.summary: Records how far the user made it through the onboarding flow. The user has an option to cancel onboarding on the device name page or visibility page. Once the user confirms device visibility onboarding is complete. Emitted when the user cancels onboarding during one of the steps or on successful completion.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Payload.AttachmentType{Variation}
histogram.summary: Records the attachment types from {Variation}. Emitted after all attachment transfers conclude, successfully or not, for a given share target.

variant.summary: any Nearby Share attempt, agnostic of final result and direction

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Payload.FinalStatus{UpgradedMedium}
histogram.summary: Records whether a payload transfer succeeded, failed, or was cancelled when transmitted over {UpgradedMedium}. Emitted when the payload transfer finishes, independent of whether the transfer was successful.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Payload.Medium
histogram.summary: Records if a payload transfer used an upgraded bandwidth medium, and if so, which medium. Emitted when the payload transfer finishes, independent of whether the transfer was successful.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Payload.Medium.Over5MbTransferred{ShareTargetType}
histogram.summary: Records if a payload transfer with {ShareTargetType} used an upgraded bandwidth medium, and if so, which medium. Emitted when the payload transfer finishes if over 5MB was transferred, independent of whether the transfer was successful.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Payload.NumAttachments{Type}
histogram.summary: Records the number of {Type} attachments intended to be sent in a Nearby Share transfer. Emitted when the transfer concludes, successfully or not.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Payload.TotalSize{Variation}
histogram.summary: Records the total payload size of a Nearby Share transfer {Variation}. Emitted when the transfer concludes.

variant.summary: for all sharing scenarios, agnostic of final result, device type, or transfer medium

variant.name: .NoMediumUpgrade
variant.summary: when using the initial bandwidth medium

variant.name: .UnknownDeviceType
variant.summary: when sharing with an unknown device type

variant.name: .UnknownMediumUpgrade
variant.summary: when using an unknown bandwidth-upgraded medium

variant.name: .WebRtcUpgrade
variant.summary: when using an upgraded WebRTC medium

variant.name: .WifiLanUpgrade
variant.summary: when using an upgraded WifiLan medium

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Payload.TransferRate{Variation}
histogram.summary: Records the payload transfer rate of a Nearby Share transfer {Variation}. Emitted when the transfer concludes.

variant.summary: for all sharing scenarios, agnostic of final result, device type, or transfer medium

variant.name: .NoMediumUpgrade
variant.summary: when using the initial bandwidth medium

variant.name: .UnknownDeviceType
variant.summary: when sharing with an unknown device type

variant.name: .UnknownMediumUpgrade
variant.summary: when using an unknown bandwidth-upgraded medium

variant.name: .WebRtcUpgrade
variant.summary: when using an upgraded WebRTC medium

variant.name: .WifiLanUpgrade
variant.summary: when using an upgraded WifiLan medium

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.StartAdvertising.Result.FailureReason{Mode}
histogram.summary: Records the reason Nearby Share advertising failed to start in {Mode} mode.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.StartAdvertising.Result{Mode}
histogram.summary: Records the result of starting Nearby Share advertising in {Mode} mode.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.TimeFromInitiateSendToRemoteDeviceNotification
histogram.summary: Records the time from initiating a send on a share target to sending the introduction frame. This roughly measures the delay between choosing a share target to initiate a transfer and displaying the accept/reject notification on the receiving device. Emitted after the user selects a device when the introduction frame has been sent, and this is only emitted after a successful connection is established. This metric is only emitted for outgoing transfers.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.TimeFromLocalAcceptToTransferStart
histogram.summary: Records the time from accepting a share on the receiving device until the first payload byte is processed. Emitted after accepting a share when the first in progress payload transfer update is received. This metric is only emitted for incoming transfers.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Transfer.FinalStatus{Variation}
histogram.summary: Records the final status of a Nearby Share transfer {Variation}. Emitted when a transfer completes successfully, fails, or was aborted by the user, for example, by cancelling the transfer.

variant.summary: for all sharing scenarios, agnostic of send/receive, device type, or contact/non-contact

variant.name: .UnknownDeviceType
variant.summary: when sharing with an unknown device type

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Transfer.Success
histogram.summary: Records the success/failure of a Nearby Share transfer. Emitted when a transfer completes successfully or definitively fails, but not for indeterminate states like cancellation.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.Transfer.Success.{Direction}.{ShareTargetType}.{ContactStatus}
histogram.summary: Records the success/failure of a Nearby Share {Direction} transfer with {ShareTargetType} using {ContactStatus}. Emitted when a transfer completes successfully or definitively fails, but not for indeterminate states like cancellation.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.VisibilityChoice
histogram.summary: Records the user's chosen degree of visibility to their contacts, selected during onboarding or updated in settings. Emitted at login for users that have Nearby Share enabled.

histogram.name: Nearby.Share.WifiNetworkConfiguration.Result
histogram.summary: Records the success/failure of the Wi-Fi Network Configuration Handler. When Wi-Fi credentials are successfully received, the Configuration Handler will attempt to configure that network automatically. Emitted immediately after the transfer has completed and the Configuration Handler attempted to configure the network.
